cleaned_text: Leadership & Staff Team Our core team of advocates carries out the day-to-day work of educating the public, increasing access to naturopathic medicine, advancing professional development, and building alliances. IRC Program Director Executive Editor Advancement & Programs Officer Chief of Staff Naturally Well Program Director Website & Social Media Manager Editor & Content Specialist Content Writer Primary Care Task Force Co-Chair Primary Care Task Force Co-Chair Operations IT / Webmaster Andrew d'Ablaing, ND Board of Directors The Institute for Natural Medicine is led by a talented team of naturopathic visionaries including licensed NDs and communications experts. Chair of the INM Board Secretary Treasurer (joins on 1/1/24) Ex Officio: AANP ED Ex Officio: AANP President Leadership Council The members of the INM leadership council help shape the direction of INM. Each member represents a leading voice in the field of Naturopathic Medicine.
